get.summary: Returns Grand Prize, Numbers, and Winning Tiers

parameters.name: OrganizationCode
parameters.description: Filter by organization or state. i.e. IA for Iowa (default: 'ALL')

parameters.name: DrawId
parameters.description: The unique drawing, if supplied this overrides DrawDate and GameCode

parameters.name: DrawDate
parameters.description: The date of the drawing in the United States

parameters.name: ExternalDrawId
parameters.description: External identifier for FastPlay Games

parameters.name: GameCode
parameters.description: Game Code for which you want data for (default: 'powerball').

allOf.description: Represents the grand prize API response model

annuity.description: The annuitized prize value if game supports annuity payout

nextAnnuity.description:
The next annuitized prize if game supports annuity payout, this value is not official until
 equals 'complete'

nextCash.description:
The next cash value, this value is not official until  equals
'complete'

prizeText.description: English friendly prize display of current prize i.e '$1.100 Billion'

cashPrizeText.description: English friendly prize display of current cash prize i.e '$550.2 Million'

prizeCombined.description: English friendly prize display of current prize with cash i.e '$1.100 Billion ($550.2 Million Cash Value)'

nextPrizeText.description: English friendly prize display of next prize i.e '$1.35 Billion'

nextCashPrizeText.description: English friendly prize display of next cash prize i.e '$659.5 Million'

nextPrizeCombined.description: English friendly prize display of next prize with cash i.e '$1.35 Billion ($659.5 Million Cash Value)'

drawId.description: The unique ID for the drawing

statusCode.description: Status of the drawing. When value is complete the next Grand Prize is valid.

drawDate.description: The draw date in YYYY-MM-DD format

drawDateUtc.description: Draw date and estimated time for which the numbers will be drawn in UTC

code.description: Unique code for the drawing.  See Games API for valid values

drawId.description: The unique id for the drawing

drawDate.description: The draw date in YYYY-MM-DD format

drawDateUtc.description: Draw date and estimated time for which the numbers will be drawn in UTC

allOf.description: Represents the numbers API response model

itemCode.description: The item code for which this number is drawn

ruleCode.description: The rule code for which this number is drawn

orderDrawn.description: Represents the order in which the number was drawn for the rule

allOf.description: Represents the winners API response model
Represents the draw report API response model

GameResponseModel.description: Represents the games API response model

games.description: List of active and inactive games for which data is available

GameModel.description: The container for an individual game

isActive.description: Indicates the game is still active

organizations.description: Contains all the participating organizations for the game

components.description: Contains individual components of the game

organizationCode.description: The unique code for the organization, currently the 2 digit abbreviation for US States and Territories

ComponentModel.description: Represents a unique component to a game

itemCode.description: The unique item code for the component

drawDays.description: The days of the week that the component is drawn

rules.description: The rules that make up the component

tiers.description: The different winning tiers that pay out prizes

RuleModel.description: Represents a rule for a component

quantity.description: Number of numbers or balls drawn for the rule

startNumber.description: Minimum value or ball number for the rule

endNumber.description: Maximum value or ball number for the rule

prize.description: Optional value representing the US Dollar amount the prize pays

x-api-key.description: Submit this form to receive an API Key
x-api-key.name: x-api-key
